name: Cue Roll
description:
Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Cue Roll is a survival platformer where you try surviving in an area with randomly picked challenges and intensities that gets more difficult as it continues.

Sadly, the time constraint didnt allow me to add everything i wanted. However, Cue Roll is soon to be updated with:

- More Dices!

- Shiny Particles!

- Even More Waves!

Please stay tuned for these updates, and thank you for playing!

Cover art by Bredi (it looks so god damn good)
